com.plexobject.service

Interface InterceptorsLifecycle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IncomingInterceptorsLifecycle, OutgoingInterceptorsLifecycle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterceptorLifecycleImpl, ServiceRegistry

    public interface InterceptorsLifecycle
extends IncomingInterceptorsLifecycle, OutgoingInterceptorsLifecycle
    This interface defines methods for adding/removing interceptors

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AroundInterceptor getAroundInterceptor()
      This method returns around-interceptor that wraps execution of underlying service invocation
      void setAroundInterceptor(AroundInterceptor interceptor)
      This interceptor is called around the underlying service invocation

      • Methods inherited from interface com.plexobject.service.OutgoingInterceptorsLifecycle

        addOutputInterceptor, addResponseInterceptor, getOutputInterceptors, getResponseInterceptors, hasOutputInterceptors, hasResponseInterceptors, removeOutputInterceptor, removeResponseInterceptor
